title: Soused fresh sardine salad
ingredients: ['8 fresh sardines, cleaned, scaled and heads removed', '1 small lemon, cut into 8 thin slices and each slice halved', '250 g (8½ oz) couscous', '1½ tsp ground coriander', '1 tsp turmeric', 'pinch of cayenne pepper', '1½ tsp butter', '600 ml (1 pint) boiling water', '1 can chickpeas, about 410 g, drained and rinsed', '4 spring onions, finely chopped', '2 large peppers (1 red and 1 yellow), seeded and finely diced', '1 large courgette, grated', '140 g (5 oz) baby spinach leaves', 'fresh flat-leaf parsley to garnish', 'salt and pepper', 'Marinade', 'finely grated zest of 1 large lemon', '4 tbsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp garlic-flavoured olive oil', '1 fresh red or green chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '6 black peppercorns, lightly cracked', '1 bay leaf']
